Through the trees, he watched the black figures of the gunners as they hastened worked swiftly and intently. Their labor seemed

The guns squatted in a row like savage chiefs. They
argued with abrupt violence. It was a grim pow-wow. Their busy servants ran hither and there. thither.
A small procession of wounded men were going
drearily toward the rear. It was a flow of blood from the wounded torn
body of the brigade.
